scripts.build: tsc && npm run build:copy && npm run build:fiximports && npm run build:browserify && npm run build:revision
scripts.cleanbuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.publish: npm run cleanbuild && npm run publish:script
scripts.publish:script: sh bin/publish.sh Commit $(git rev-parse HEAD) to $(git config --get remote.origin.url)
scripts.build:browserify: mkdir -p tree; npx browserify -p esmify -o tree/bundle.js dest/appui.js
scripts.build:copy: npm run build:copy:public; npm run build:copy:js
scripts.build:copy:public: mkdir -p tree; (cd public; tar cf - .) | (cd tree; tar xf -)
